forms.title: Profit Today
forms.description:
Your profit will consist of two components - Invitation Bonus and Betting Commission
  • Betting Commission: This will be your main income and you will receive a different percentage of each bet you invite players to make as a commission.
  • Invite Bonus: The user you invite to deposit for the first time will receive a cash bonus of R$8
forms.desc: You receive a commission for every bet you invite users to make, win or lose. So all you have to do is improve your gaming skills, think about how to win the game and share it with everyone to help more people win with your method. We want all players to have fun at BetDino, whether it's the fun of winning bets or the game itself!

invite.title: Invite a Partner
invite.how: How does the invitation bonus work?
invite.how3:
Each deposit user can receive at least R$8 for each invite. The more people you invite, the greater the invite bonus for the corresponding level.
For specific rules, see the table below

commission.title: HOW TO GET COMMISSION ON YOUR BETS
commission.description:
Invite Rules: Valid invite level can reach level 3, and the wager discount reward is
- [Level 1- 0.15% ]
- [Level 2- 0.07% ]
- [Level 3- 0.02% ]
Reward Issuance Time: Real-time settlement and issuance
For example, the invite ratio is A invite B, B invite C, C invite D, D invite E. When E bets 10000BRL
※ D can get 10000 * 0.15% = 15 R$
※ C can get 10000 * 0.07% = 7 R$
※ B can get 10000 * 0.02% = 2 R$
※ A has no return in three Levels.
commission.description2: This will be your long-term income and you will receive a different percentage of commission each time a player you invite places a bet.

fairness.title:
How to check
fairness?
fairness.description:
Even Lucky result on BetDino is
absolutely random. Check it yourself!
fairness.how2: The provably fair principle is based on SHA256 technology the same as Bitcoin. The procedure of checking bets result allows you to verify the fairness of each bet.

01.title: Find your client seed and nonce
01.description:
Client seed could be of any value. By default it's generated randomly - open game settings and find it there, but you can change it.
Nonce starts at 1 and increases by 1 every time you start a new game.

02.title: Place a Bet
02.description:
Server seed will be generated, but it will be hidden until you finish the game.
Open "History" tab and look at your last game. All information will be here - including server seed.
Now you have 3 values - server and client seed alongside nonce.

03.title: Verify
03.description: Enter client seed, server seed and nonce in verifier. Result should be identical.

dice.1: Set the slider chance of winning and click "Play", to generate a result from 0 - 100
dice.2: If the bones fell in your chosen green zone - you won!

wheel.1: Select a game mode, bet on color and press "Play"
wheel.2: If the wheel stops at the color sector that you have chosen, you won!

x50.1: Select a game mode, bet on color and press "Play"
x50.2: If the wheel stops at the color sector that you have chosen, you won!

plinko.1: Place a bet, select the difficulty of the game and the number of pins, and click "Play"
plinko.2: The greater the complexity of the game and the number of pins, the higher the maximum and lower minimum winning odds
plinko.3: Your reward is determined by the winning ratio, depending on where the ball fell

keno.1: Pick from 1 to 10 cells with numbers, place a bet and click "Play"
keno.2: Then the system randomly selects 10 numbers. The more hits on your numbers, the greater the gain!

mines.1: Place a bet, select the number of bombs and click "Play"
mines.2: The larger the number of bombs in the playing field, the higher the winning ratio.
mines.3: Look for stones, but beware of bombs!
mines.4: Take a win before you detonate on a bomb and lose a bet!

diamonds.1: Get the best diamond combination to win.
diamonds.2: The best combination is 5 identical diamonds.
diamonds.3: The combination hierarchy is similar to traditional poker.

coinflip.1: Place a bet and click "Play" and guess what color will fall.
coinflip.2: You can guess a coin an unlimited number of times per game, all coefficients will be added up.

blackjack.1: Place a bet, after which you and the dealer will be dealt two cards.
blackjack.2: Then you can take another card or stop and do not change the current hand.
blackjack.3: By clicking on "Double" you double your bet and take the last card.
blackjack.4: Insurance is available only when the first dealer card is an ace and insures you from the hands of a dealer with blackjack.
blackjack.5: The winner is the one closest to 21. If you and the dealer have the same value - there will be a draw.

roulette.1: Put chips on any outcome of the game and click "Play"
roulette.2: If you guessed the outcome of the game, you multiply your bet.

baccarat.1: You can bet on the victory of a player, banker or a draw both individually and in any combination.
baccarat.2: The victory is won by the party with the most points close to 9. When a value of 10 or more is set, only the second digit of the double-digit number is taken into account.
baccarat.3: If at an individual bet on a player or a banker both parties gain the same amount of points, then the result is a tie without losing a bet.
baccarat.4: The maximum deal in one hand is 3 cards. The minimum is 2 if their total points are 5 or more.

hilo.1: Guess if the next card will be higher or lower than the previous one in rank.
hilo.2: Open an unlimited number of cards, odds are added up. You can stop at any time and pick up the winnings

limbo.1: To win, the specified target payout ratio must be lower than the one that fell out in the game.

crash.1: Make a bet, click "Play" and watch how the schedule grows
crash.2: Withdraw funds before the chart collapses and you lose your bet.

stairs.1: Make a bet, select the number of stones per move and click "Play"
stairs.2: Climb up the stairs beware of falling on stones! The higher you rise, the greater the gain you will receive.
stairs.3: You can pick up a win at any time or go through all 13 moves and get the maximum reward.

tower.1: Place a bet, select the number of bombs and click "Play"
tower.2: Look for stones moving from top to bottom, but beware of bombs!
tower.3: Take a win before you detonate on a bomb and lose a bet!

videopoker.2: Next you will be dealt 5 cards. You can leave the cards you need by clicking on them. To end the game, click on "Deal cards"
videopoker.3: If the combination is the same as shown in the table, you win and multiply your bet.

bullvsbear.1: Each game starts out by determining what the ‘Game’s Strike Price’ will be by taking the averaged price of selected coin. We aren't using a price oracle, but instead we pull the market price directly from Coinbase’s Price Websocket API. This number is what traders will use to bet against in the following phase to predict if the market price will be above or below the “Game’s Strike Price” at the end of each game.
bullvsbear.2: Once the Game’s Strike Price has been set, players have one minute to bet on whether the market price at the end of each game will be above or below this number. All bets are put into two pools, those who predict the price will be above, and those who predict the price will be below.
bullvsbear.3: At the end of each game, the losing side’s bets are pooled and distributed to the winners proportionately. If a player bets more than the other winners, he or she will receive more of the pool. Now if a player loses, their losses are also proportionate to the size of their, meaning if a player bets more than the other players, in this situation that player won’t lose their entire bet, just a fraction.
bullvsbear.4: We wanted to avoid giving any significant advantage to last movers, hence we implemented a time-decaying gain factor to incentivize prompt betting — giving early movers better gains (or winnings) and discouraging people from bet stuffing late in the round. As a trader, you can keep an eye on current volatility and make your bet by waiting a little longer and taking lesser gains but with higher probability, or alternately, betting early with higher potential gain but lower probability of winning the game.
bullvsbear.5: Every betting round is 90 seconds long and starts at x5.00 payout. It decreases over time till it becomes x1.01.

general.unavailable_country: Your IP address appears to be from {country}, a jurisdiction in which we can not legally accept players. Occasionally this is a false positive, e.g. the result of connecting through a proxy server in {country}. If so you may continue provided you are located and reside where such service is legal. Please remember that it is your obligation to obey local laws at all times.
